title: Need suggestion on contributing TFDPR
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['src/transformers/modeling_tf_dpr.py', 'src/transformers/__init__.py', 'src/transformers/convert_pytorch_checkpoint_to_tf2.py', 'src/transformers/utils/dummy_tf_objects.py', 'docs/source/model_doc/dpr.rst'], 'reasoning': "1. src/transformers/modeling_tf_dpr.py: Implements the TFDPR model; core location for new code and fixes (including weight loading and TF naming issues).
2. src/transformers/__init__.py: Registers/imports the new model class to the library so it's user-accessible.
3. src/transformers/convert_pytorch_checkpoint_to_tf2.py: Ensures PyTorch-to-TensorFlow weight conversion works for TFDPR; handles weight name mapping and conversion quirks.
4. src/transformers/utils/dummy_tf_objects.py: Adds dummy objects so import does not break when TensorFlow is not installed; maintains code base robustness.
5. docs/source/model_doc/dpr.rst: Adds/updates documentation for the new TFDPR model, ensuring users know how to use TFDPR and its limitations.
Other files (e.g. modeling_dpr.py, configuration_dpr.py) do not need direct changes unless config inheritance or new arguments are introduced."}
